alert.note: Alert for Burnett; Washburn (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 3:59PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN DOUGLAS, WASHBURN AND EASTERN BURNETT COUNTIES THROUGH 500 PM CDT... At 359 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Gordon, to 7 miles southwest of Minong, to 8 miles northwest of Cumberland, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wascott, Gordon, Minong and Shell Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
